document.full_text: sidney lumet, an american film director known for inspiring top-notch performances from actors in a stream of classic films including "12 angry men," "dog day afternoon," "network" and "fail-safe," died on saturday at age 86, his hollywood talent agency said.
document.title: prolific american film director sidney lumet dies
